TopicTitle: Would like to launch+dock in same order as the real International Space Station (ISS)

Articles.Content:
I would like to launch in the same order that the international space station was created in real life. I have tried to use http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24728-International-construction-ISS-in-Kerbal-orbit

however i've encountered to many bugs attempting to split the sections up and launch them. I've also tried a Stock Wiki to create my own sections but its not a complete wiki.

I have searched and searched and I'm stunned not to find someone has designed all the launches/sections in stock.

Or maybe i missed it in my search. can anyone point me in the right direction?

Maybe i can fix the bugs in international contruction ISS in kerbal orbit project. My engines show a strange thrust graphic out the side and wont launch. also the game seems to think my craft is a space plane as thats the only option to return to the space plane center.

BTW. I'm using

which dates the parts and launches. I would really enjoy launching the same same order as the real space station. Would be very educational as well.

Thanks for anyone that takes the time to respond.

Oh I'm not very smart. I just now realized that all sections are seperate part options. So i can launch everything. Anyone else having trouble. i re-downloaded the newest KSP and it seems to work perfectly now with the ISS download i mention above. This post can actually be deleted. I didn't find an option to do so.
